mapper.insert: insert into WS_TASK (taskid, tasktype, begeindate, enddate, remark, remark1, remark2, remark3) values (#{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tasktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begeindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update WS_TASK set tasktype = #{tasktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begeindate = #{begeindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enddate = #{enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where taskid = #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select taskid, tasktype, begeindate, enddate, remark, remark1, remark2, remark3 from WS_TASK
